skills.name: Eldritch Flames
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has a 30% chance of placing an
[HP Burn]
for 2 turns. Heals this Champion by 20% of the damage inflicted if the target is afflicted by a
[HP Burn]
debuff.
Damage based on
[DEF]
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
